author: Special Correspondent
text:
This is the second time that Dr. C.K. Ramaiah’s biography is making it to the prestigious manual.— Photo: Special Arrangement

Chennupati Kodanda Ramaiah, Dean, School of Media and Communication at the Pondicherry Central University has been nominated for inclusion in ‘Marquis Who’s Who in the World’ which is a revered biographic reference standard in the world.

The nomination of Dr. Ramaiah’s biography is for the 2014 edition of the Marquis Who’s Who.

The Marquis Who’s Who in the World is the standard for reliable and comprehensive biographical data in the world published since 1899.

Its Publications Board only includes a limited number of experts and experienced individuals who have demonstrated outstanding achievements in their respective fields of endeavour and who have contributed significantly to the betterment of contemporary society.

It is published in both print and electronic versions and includes more than 1.4 million biographies.

This is the second time that Dr. Ramaiah’s biography is making it to the prestigious manual.

His biography was also published in 1989 edition of Marquis Who’s Who in the World (USA).

His biography was also covered in Outstanding People of the 20th Century; Who’s Who in Australia and the Pacific Nations; Dictionary of International Biography, International Biographical Centre, Cambridge, England, 1997, and a host of other biography standards.

As a Professor of Library and Information Science in Pondicherry University, he has over 30 years of experience that includes stints at the Loughborough University of Technology, England and Nanyang Technological University, Singapore.
title: Pondicherry University Dean nominated for ‘Marquis Who’s Who’
